data.text: @Sid6gupta Mr Gupta, we understand your concern. We shall have your feedback shared with the concerned team which will help us enhance & deliver better services to you in the future. ~Linda
@TheTanveerism Mr Zaidi, please allow us some time to check with our airport team. ~Linda

@ronakg Mr. Gala, we try our best to keep our flights insect free, however, at times entry of such creatures are uncontrollable while the aircraft door is kept open. Do get in touch with the inflight crew, they will see if something can be done. ~Linda

@RohanSh20540445 Sir, we are elated to know this and thank you from the bottom of our hearts for sharing your happy experience with us. We have dimple cheeks to see our customers happy😊. See you soon again!💙 ~Yashica

#GoIndiGo
@kumar_akash1011 Yes, you may carry the same till 100 ml in the hand baggage. ~Snigdha

@planetartz Hi, your feedback is very important for us to improve our services and we shall certainly share the same with our concerned team at the earliest. Hoping to provide you with a better check-in experience in times to come. Thank you for highlighting this to us. ~Yashica
@MuktaLokesh Sir, your child will not be required to carry the RTPCR test for traveling. We hope this clarifies. ~Ojasvi

@MrsMomB Ms Tomar, we are here to help you and request you to share some more details on your concern with us over DM along with your contact number so we may provide assistance at the earliest. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@PranavSandilyaa Mr Kumar, this is not the experience we intend to deliver to our flyers. Please share your PNR with us over DM so we can look into this further and assist you in the best way possible. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@AnanMylapalli Sir, we regret the experience and this is not what we intend to deliver to our customers. We see that the aircraft is airborne and well on its way to the destination now. We wish you a pleasant flight and hope to avoid such delays in the future. ~Yashica
@MalpaniYuvraj We understand your disappointment, sir. Please know, we are sharing your the matter with the concerned team for further review. ~Diyashi
@AjayMahAstute Mr Mahajan, we request you to share your PNR with us over DM so we can look into it and assist you further. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@PriyaSrived Ma'am, we assure you our team is doing its best to get all customers airborne and on their way to their destination at the earliest. Your patience during this interim is highly appreciated. ~Yashica

@SubhankerM Sir, we understand your disappointment.  It can be very stressful, our team at the airport tries to assist everyone in the best possible way. However, please know our check-in counter closes 60 mins prior to the departure. We look forward to your understanding. ~Diyashi

@Rohitsports1 Sir, it was never our intent to cause any discomfort and regret the same, however, only one piece of hand luggage of 7 kg is permitted in the aircraft. Any excess weight in the luggage beyond the permitted allowance is chargeable. We look forward to your understanding. ~Yashica

@vavasthi Mr Avasthi, the flight got delayed due to the late arrival of the incoming aircraft. Meanwhile, please DM us your PNR so we can also raise this with our concerned team. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@tripathi_marut_ Mr Tripathi, sorry to note your disappointment. Please be informed, seats are allocated as per availability. Further, please know delays are equally painful for us. It is only under extreme uncontrollable situation we're compelled to make such changes in the schedule. ~Linda
@codic_int Hello, we no transit visa is required, if the security area of the airport is not existed. Do let us know for further assistance. ~Diyashi

@unnisam30 Sir, you can carry two pieces of check-in luggage with you, divided into 15 kg in the first bag and 10 kg in the second piece of luggage under the super 6E booking. We look forward to welcoming you on-board. ~Yashica

@navya79171596 Ma'am, we regret the experience! However, our customer relations team tried to get in touch with you but the number was busy. We'd request you to revert to the same email with all the details as asked for our team to assist you further. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@murtuzaina Sir, we try our best to keep the aircraft insect-free by regularly spraying disinfectants. We are sure that you will understand that entry of insects or flies cannot be completely guarded against. Did you reach out to our cabin crew? ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@Omroygemini Mr Roy, we are concerned to hear this. Please help us with your PNR via DM so we can assist at the earliest. Further, we request you to get in touch with our airport team for real-time assistance.  ~Ojasvi

@PrabhatNigamXHG @vasujain @PMOIndia Sir, our team tried connecting with you on the registered number however they couldn't get through. Could you please DM an alternate number so we may connect with you? ~Kritika

data.text: @ani_hy Sir. if the visa has been issued with more than one name or the father's/family name is mentioned on the second page. Passengers shall be accepted. ~Snigdha
@raj1712 We regret the delayed response, sir. As checked full refund has been initiated for the return sector. Do let us know for further assistance.
@kun_bhambhani Sir, we believe the issue has been addressed by the concerned team. In case any further assistance is needed, we are only a DM away. ~Ojasvi
@akabhishek18 Sir, we have replied to your DM. You may adhere to the same. ~Snigdha
@huqon Sir, if the visa has been issued with more than one name or the father's/family name is mentioned on the second page, she may indeed travel. ~Snigdha

urls.title: Change your flight in easy steps - IndiGo
urls.description: Change your IndiGo flight with the step by step guide to flight change. Know the flight change charges for domestic and international bookings, at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @jeetram_meena19 Hi, please visit https://t.co/ZmOTQZOynT to reschedule your booking with applicable charges. If you face any issues, we are only a DM away. ~Ojasvi

@pri4mahesh_g Hi, we are concerned to see this. Free seats are subject to availability as the same is limited in inventory. Charges are only for preferred seat selection. You may opt for auto-assigned seats during web check-in to avoid any charges, ~Ojasvi
@Shaikh04Irfan Hi, please share a screenshot of the error you are facing along with your contact number and registered email ID via DM for us to check and assist. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@mathurarvinds Mr Mathur, we are concerned to know this. We request you to share your concern in detail and your contact number via DM so we can connect with you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@drswapnarohit We regret the delayed response, Mr Sahu.  We believe our customer relations team assisted with the concern. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi
@shiitiiz We regret the delayed response, Mr Sinha. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi
@Anubhav_hello Hi, we request you to share your PNR via DM so we can check and advise. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@surajmysun123 Sir, we regret the delayed response. We advise to carry id card, to avoid any kind of hassle at the airport. ~Diyashi

@Chandan09918091 Sir, we always advise our customers to report at least 2 hours prior to departure to avoid any last-minute hassle. Please know our check-in counter closes 60 mins & the boarding gate closes 25 mins prior to departure. We look forward to your understanding. ~Ojasvi
@aman48811 Sir, we regret the delayed response. We request you to keep a track on our social media sites or website for the update on the same. ~Diyashi
@Sandipwason Sir, we regret the delayed response. Could you please share your concern via DM so we may assist you. ~Diyashi
@RealCr33py Sir, we are concerned to see this. We are raising this with the concerned time right away and will be back with an update soon. ~Ojasvi
@shivengoel8 We regret the delayed response, Mr Goel. We have replied to you via DM please check. ~Diyashi
@vegetariannwolf Hi, we are concerned to see this. Please help us with your PNR via DM and we'll raise this with the concerned team at the earliest. ~Ojasvi

urls.title: Dangerous Goods, Things not allowed in flight | IndiGo
urls.description: Visit this page to know about which items are prohibited in checked and cabin baggage and what not? Get all information about our dangerous goods policy.

data.text: @shivendu_pande Sir, we request you to visit https://t.co/LkNT56dVVI to know about the allowed/prohibited items. Further, you may share the description via DM. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@sheroymistry1 Hi, this is not the service we intend to provide. We request you to share your PNR via DM so we can share this with the concerned team for further review right away. ~Ojasvi
@vinaypareek Mr Pareek, please DM us the concern in detail so we can assist you further. Thanks. ~Ojasvi

@SuchitraIyer7 Ms Iyer, we request the inconvenience caused. As checked, the refund has been initiated to the primary mode of payment on the 30th of October, 2022. We request you to contact the concerned travel agency for further assistance. ~Ojasvi
@MuktaLokesh Hi, children below the age of 12 are exempted from vaccination proof. We hope this clarifies. :) ~Ojasvi
@raziqasmi Hi, the weight of ZamZam Water is included in your Checked-in Baggage allowance. ~Ojasvi

@fearlessness96 Mr Verma, we regret the inconvenience caused. It is never our intention to disrupt the plan of our passengers. We request you to share your PNR via DM so we can raise this with the concerned team for further review. ~Ojasvi
@accesstejas Sir, we understand your disappointment. Please share the PNR via DM so we may get the matter checked and raise it with the concerned team. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@Manansagar5 Sir, your son will be required to carry the RTPCR test for traveling. ~Ojasvi
@mesaurabh09 Hi, you may carry a walker in check-in baggage. ~Ojasvi
@surajsagarsaho2 Mr Sahoo, we are concerned to hear this. Please help us with your PNR via DM and we'll raise this with the concerned team right away. ~Ojasvi
@Shakeel830 Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. We are raising this issue with the concerned team for further review right away. ~Ojasvi

@paritoshb Sir, we are concerned to know about this. We never intend to disrupt the plans of our customers. Further, our operations depend on various factors, some of which are uncontrollable and may disrupt the schedule. We hope for your understanding. ~Ojasvi

@Singhsir18 Sir, we regret to know about your experience. We always advise our customers to pre-book the meal of their choice so as to avoid any wastage of food onboard. We have noted your feedback and hope to serve you better in the future. ~Ojasvi

urls.title: Jobs at IndiGo
urls.description: It’s time to recruit smart. Param's recruiting software helps automate tedious, repetitive manual tasks like resume screening. It equips recruiters with the means to efficiently cater to increasingly complex recruiting deliverables.

data.text:
Your chance to apply now and be a part of our airport operations team. Walk-ins open for:

 Delhi
 Pune

 For more details visit https://t.co/HOsnEj54e7. #goIndiGo #AOCS #Hiring #HiringNow #Aviation https://t.co/MZXVmowHNn

data.text: @IndVsStupidity Hi, the boarding pass is sent to the registered email ID within 12-3 hours prior to the departure. We request you to share your PNR via DM and we will check and assist at the earliest. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@ehs_eec Sir,  we understand your concern, we have replied to you. Kindly check the DM. ~Diyashi
@IndiGo6E Hello, we regret the delayed response. We believe our airport team assisted you and the AirPods have been received by you. ~Diyashi

data.text: @suruchi_agg We regret the delayed response. We have replied to you via DM, requesting you to check the same. ~Diyashi
@JakirHu70221411 Sir, since this is an international flight, you may connect with our team at the check-in counter and they will assist you with the check-in. ~Ojasvi
@pankajkatyal01 We regret the delayed response. We believe that the baggage has been received by you. Thank you. ~Diyashi
@ImperialMonk Hi, we request you to share your PNR via DM and we'll assist at the earliest. ~Ojasvi

@agrawaltarangks Mr Agrawal, this is not the service we intend to provide. Please help us with your PNR along with the copy of the PIR issued by the arrival airport via DM so we can check and assist. ~Ojasvi
@ShahuSuryawans3 For further assistance please share your PNR via DM so we may assist you with the same. ~Diyashi (2/2)  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@ShahuSuryawans3 We understand your concern, sir. However please be informed that we do not charge for web check-in or boarding passes. You may avail free seats by opting the auto seat assignment during web check-in. (1/2)

@ankurktrSG Sir, we regret the delayed response and the inconvenience caused to you. The flight cannot be boarded from the connecting airport or middle sector. We look forward for your understanding. ~Diyashi

@IndiGo6E Sir, we believe one of our representatives was able to assist you with your raised concern. We hope the flight will make up for this and wish you a pleasant journey. If any further, assistance is needed, we are only a DM away. ~Ojasvi

@arunhat Sir, it is not mandatory to buy a seat. If you do not wish to pay for the seat, while doing the web check-in, please click on the auto-assign option which is available 6 hours prior to the departure and a seat will be assigned to you as per the availability. ~Ojasvi
@SalilDobhal Hello, allow us some time to get it checked and get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi
@harshainna Mr Bhat, we are concerned to hear this. Please allow us some time to get this checked and we'll get back to you with an update soon. ~Ojasvi
@akpandey02 Mr Pandey, we are concerned to hear this. We request you to share your experience in detail via DM so we can check and assist further. ~Ojasvi
@Prak_ap Sir, we are concerned to see this. We are raising this with the concerned team and will get back to you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi

@JournoHarsh Thank you for the kind words, Sir. We take pride in our work and our sincerest hope is that it helps each one of our customers. We will surely have your appreciation shared with the team and we look forward to having you onboard soon again. ~Ojasvi  #GoIndiGo
@gauravsh222 Sir, we regret the trouble. We request you to share your PNR via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@huqon Hi, please allow us some time to get this checked, and we'll get back to you at the earliest.~ Nandita
@shreepanis Sir, we regret the inconvenience. Please DM us your experience in detail along with the PNR for us to take a closer look.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@iamwasimahmed07 Sir, we regret the trouble. We request you to share your concern in detail along with your PNR via DM so, we may look into it and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@MIRAGE_ENJOYER Hi, thank you for your kind words. Our pilots are well-trained to offer a safe & comfortable journey and all our customers are always in safe hands. We will surely pass on your kudos to our concerned team members.~ Nandita
@Hyy_mag Sir, we are concerned to know what went wrong. We request you to share your experience in detail via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

urls.title: Dangerous Goods, Things not allowed in flight | IndiGo
urls.description: Visit this page to know about which items are prohibited in checked and cabin baggage and what not? Get all information about our dangerous goods policy.

data.text: @theroyal141994 Hi, you may visit https://t.co/kqjvaCdH9x to check the list of baggage items that are allowed and restricted.~ Nandita

@abhishek_dhule Sir, we're sad to see you upset. We believe one of our representatives addressed your concern via call and assisted you regarding this matter. As checked, the booking stands cancelled and the refund is initiated from our end to the original mode of payment.~ Nandita

@jaydeepvaghela Sir, we regret the trouble. Please know that the name on the ticket should match with the ID proof. We request the customer to reach out to our airport staff and they will assist him further.~ Nandita
@AdityaD14487339 Sir, we regret the inconvenience. We are sharing this with our concerned team to assist you further.~ Nandita
@bimadraj Sir, please share the registered email id, contact number, and transaction details via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@karansaraogi so, we may share your feedback with our concerned team. We wish to provide you with a better experience in the future.~ Nandita (2/2)

@karansaraogi Sir, we work hard to keep our flight clean and insect-free, hope you'll understand insects or mosquitoes cannot be completely guarded against and we can't fumigate when passengers are on board. We request you to DM us your PNR (1/2)
@pallavi_sati @Pib_MoCA @JM_Scindia will be shared with our concerned team for necessary review and action.~Nandita(2/2)

data.text: @RajeshNarredu @TOIBengaluru @toi @DeccanChronicle @DeccanHerald We truly regret the delay and will surely relay the feedback to the airport team. Thank you for speaking with us tonight and for your understanding in this matter. ~Yashica <2/2>

@RajeshNarredu @TOIBengaluru @toi @DeccanChronicle @DeccanHerald Sir, your coach was delayed as there was a last-minute change in the aircraft's parking location. At times, we don't get the same bay as assigned initially to a particular flight. <1/2>

@AshayM_ Sir, we regret to see you upset. Please know check-in counter closes 60 mins & the boarding gate closes 25 mins prior to departure. Further, please DM your PNR for us to take a closer look.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@DMarsh993 Sir, we regret the trouble. This is not the experience we wish our customers to have. We request you to share your PNR via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
